column5: Could someone recommend me a place to store my boat around the 401/400 area?  I'd like to have the option to store it inside year-round but the problem I'm having with most of the self-storage places is the 100" beam which won't fit into the standard 8' door most places seem to have.  Any recommendations?  Cheers.

I am also looking for the same think as you.  I will be fishing LAKE ONTARIO AND SIMCOE more this year . Due to the price of gas this year . I will not be traveling as far due to the cost of gas. I will let you no if I come up with a nice place for a good fair price here in the west end of the city.
Also looking for cheap land outdoor storage in the east end of the gta for my boat.
